name: Hatterene
description: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

abilities.name: Mind Hat
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may use this Ability. Each player discards a card from their hand. (Your opponent discards first.)

attacks.name: Dripping Grudge
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon for each Pokémon in your discard pile.
